did.unittitle: NYU Abu Dhabi Campus Posters Collection

physdesc.extent: in 3 document boxes, 2 oversize boxes, and 3 folders in oversize map case drawer.

did.abstract: The NYU Abu Dhabi University Archives Campus Poster Collection has been compiled by NYU Abu Dhabi Archives and Special Collections staff from a variety of sources. The collection consists of posters and flyers publicizing various campus events, such as lectures, performances, exhibitions, cultural evenings, campaigns, and other activities in the community. Dates of these posters start from 2010, and cover some earlier years of the institution, but the majority are from the Saadiyat Campus period, and specifically from 2019-present.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
The NYU Abu Dhabi University Archives Campus Poster Collection has been compiled by NYU Abu Dhabi Archives and Special Collections staff from a variety of sources. The collection consists of posters and flyers publicizing various campus events, such as lectures, performances, exhibitions, cultural evenings, campaigns, and other activities in the community. Dates of these posters start from 2010, and cover some earlier years of the institution, but the majority are from the Saadiyat Campus period, and specifically from 2019-present.
The collection is arranged into two series.
Series 1 is an accummulating collection of posters gathered by Archives and Special Collections staff during routine walks of the campus. Materials have been collected from bulletin boards, elevators, and other spaces of promotion as activities have ended. Arranged chronologically by academic years and semesters within, this series aims to provide a snapshot of campus life activities each semester.
Series 2 is a collection of Student Interest Group (SIG) and Student Activities events announcements, digitally downloaded by Archives and Special Collections Student Assistants from various spaces of student communication and exchange, such as Facebook groups, and the OrgSync and Engage platforms. This series is arranged alphabetically by SIG or Student Program.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; NYU Abu Dhabi Campus Posters Collection; RG 002.2; box number; folder number or identifier; Archives and Special Collections, New York University Abu Dhabi Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: A number of Archives and Special Collections staff have contributed to the acquisition, sorting, and arrangement and description of this collection, including Brad Bauer, Lauren Kata, Chhete Sherpa, Stefan Mitikj, Yogesh Dhungana, and Gelila Kebede.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright for NYU Abu Dhabi University records is held by NYU Abu Dhabi. Permission to use or publish materials must be obtained by contacting NYU Abu Dhabi Archives and Special Collections. Email: nyuad-asc-group@nyu.edu

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Materials related to the Campus Posters Collection include NYUAD Publications and Ephemera [RG 002.1], and Records of NYU Abu Dhabi Student Interest Groups and Student Activities [RG 009.3.1]

physdesc.extent: in 3 document boxes, 2 oversize boxes, and 3 folders in oversize map case drawer.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection of posters is comprised of posters gathered across campus spaces such as bulletin boards and inside elevators. Some posters may have also been donated from time to time by campus community members and integrated into this series.

physdesc.extent: Folders and Subfolders organized by SIG
